name: Aoi Sora no Neosphere Portable: Nanoca Flanka Hatsumei Koubouki 2
overview: A sequel of Tristia of the Deep-Blue Sea from Kogado Studio(Kumasan Team). Set in the Neosphere kingdom that fly in the air by ancient E technology. Neosphere kept going to ruin after world union war. And then, Nanoca was called to rebuild the kingdom.
